sources.title: That's My Baby! (1944)
sources.description: A love triangle occurs between the publisher's daughter Betty Moody. comic book artist Tim Jones, and the company's wily manipulative manager Hilton Payne. In addition, Betty's dad, Phineas Moody suffers from severe melancholy; and an emergency cure of laughter is required to save his health. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/thats-my-baby-1944/

sources.title: That's My Baby
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: That's My Baby! (1944) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Richard Arlen, Ellen Drew, Leonid Kinskey
Director: William Berke

THE GO-GETTIN'EST GUY AND THE GIVIN'EST GAL GET TOGETHER!

metadata.Plot: Father runs a big corporation but is suffering from a severe case of melancholia. Daughter and persona non-grata boyfriend cook up a plan to have every ex-vaudevillian and dancer on the club circuit that they can find attempt to make him smile. Groan. Scatter brained ex-wife finally saves the day by remembering that father once had ambitions to be a newspaper comic illustrator.
metadata.Writer: Nicholas T. Barrows, William Tunberg, Irving Wallace
metadata.Actors: Richard Arlen, Ellen Drew, Leonid Kinskey
